mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message ( message, message_key, message_status, verify_try_count, verify_next_retry_time, send_status, send_try_count, send_next_retry_time ) VALUES ( #{message}, #{messageKey}, #{messageStatus}, #{verifyTryCount}, #{verifyNextRetryTime}, #{sendStatus}, #{sendTryCount}, #{sendNextRetryTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, message AS message, message_key AS "messageKey", message_status AS "messageStatus", verify_try_count AS "verifyTryCount", verify_next_retry_time AS "verifyNextRetryTime", send_status AS "sendStatus", send_try_count AS "sendTryCount", send_next_retry_time AS "sendNextRetryTime", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime" FROM message WHERE message_key = #{messageKey}

SELECT id, message AS message, message_key AS "messageKey", message_status AS "messageStatus", verify_try_count AS "verifyTryCount", verify_next_retry_time AS "verifyNextRetryTime", send_status AS "sendStatus", send_try_count AS "sendTryCount", send_next_retry_time AS "sendNextRetryTime", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime" FROM message WHERE id > #{id} AND message_status = 1 AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP >= verify_next_retry_time LIMIT #{limitCount}

SELECT id, message AS message, message_key AS "messageKey", message_status AS "messageStatus", send_status AS "sendStatus", verify_try_count AS "verifyTryCount", verify_next_retry_time AS "verifyNextRetryTime", send_try_count AS "sendTryCount", send_next_retry_time AS "sendNextRetryTime", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime" FROM message WHERE id > #{id} AND message_status = 2 and send_status = 1 AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP >= send_next_retry_time LIMIT #{limitCount}
